ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] freeeqguides
ygData.msgSnippet: ... to say I was a little dissapointed in the guides. A lot of the information that they contain can be found at almost any EQ related website! It s basically
ygData.messageBody:
> Thank you for posting this. I went to check them out and you know I have
to say I was a little dissapointed in the guides. A lot of the information
that they contain can be found at almost any EQ related website! It's
basically that I'm glad I didn't pay for any of these guides, it's really
not worth the money. The only thing I'm truly interested in is making money.
Man it sucks trying to get some decent armor when you have no money. I've
wondered about the "make Plat at any level" guides and I figured that you
would still need to group or partner at some point.
>
> Either way I'm having fun just going along and doing things the old
fashioned way. I do suggest going and getting these guides because there
were a few things in there that was nice to know about but for any player,
especially noobs, I suggest doing it the old fashioned way and go out there
and take the lumps and partner with some others. It's funner and you'll feel
better knowing that you did it on your own.
>
> I got some good info about Unrest so I think I may go and try it out this
week.
>
If you have Luclin you can do what I did, run to Dawnshroud and then run
along the wall as high as you can to reach Maidens Eye. Confirm there is no
train on the inside or wait until a train has gone, then zone in and see if
there are any corpses at zone to loot. :-)
I got a goranga idol and small brick of acrylia. :-) Those sell for a decent
price. As long as you avoid mobs you're ok.
luv,
-Su
